content.about:
Prestige Estate Services provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine art (paintings, sculptures), period furniture (18th‚Äì20th century), decorative arts/jewelry collections  
- Certifications: ISA (International Society of Appraisers)/ASA (American Society) accredited; IRS-qualified estate tax reports

- Service Area: Greater Louisville (Jeffersontown, Highlands, Fern Creek) + nationwide remote support

reviews.content: Professional service with good attention to detail, but would have appreciated more explanation about my antique furniture valuation methodology.

content.about: Howard & Thomas Auction House provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles, Estate Items. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
